description: Kala Chana is a pupolar in my area. That's why i make this recipe and it's price is very cheap.People like this food very much.I sell this recipe in online. If you want to try this recipe you can order this Kala Chana Recipe

Mughlai is famous all over the world. It made by egg, flour and onion slice. People like it very much that's why I cooked this recipe in my kitchen

Samusa is interesting food in my area.  The samosa is prepared with an all-purpose flour and stuffed with a filling ,onions, green peas, lentils, ginger, spices and green chili which gives the samosa a sweet-sour taste.Somosa don't contain healthy caloris in any aspect.
